Title: Increases the personal income tax real property tax circuit breaker credit
Summary: Increases the income eligibility levels for the real property tax circuit breaker credit for taxable years beginning on and after January 1, 2020 to $25,000; increases the maximum credit available from a credit of one hundred fifty dollars for the highest income bracket to six hundred fifty dollars for the lowest income bracket.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to increasing the personal income tax real property tax circuit breaker credit
